Class Answers

java.lang.Object
model.Answers
public class Answers extends Object
The Answers class handles all logic related to managing answers, including creation, editing, deletion, and searching. Permissions: - Students can edit/delete their own answers. - Admins, instructors, reviewers, and staff can edit/delete any answer.

      public Result update(int answerId, int questionId, User currUser, String content, Boolean isSolution)
      Updates an existing answer if permitted. Students can update their own; staff/admins can update any.
